programoverview: This program teaches you how to build AI and machine learning solutions using a unique no-code approach. Youâ€™ll learn from world-renowned MIT faculty through a 12-week online curriculum, earning a Certificate of Completion from MIT Professional Education. The course provides 8 MIT CEUs.
keyfeatures: Build a portfolio with practical AI projects
faculty: Munther Dahleh EECS and IDSS, Founding Director IDSS
alumniexperience: Participants highlight the mentorship, supportive program managers, and the advantage of hands-on, practical learning. The course is praised as accessible for beginners and useful for professionals seeking to implement AI without coding.
collaboration: Program offered with Great Learning, managing enrollments and support, while MIT assures academic quality.
reputation: High ratings (4.8 on Trustpilot, 4.7 on Course Report) and strong global rankings for MIT.
targetaudience: Designed for business leaders, managers, engineers, and professionals across domains wanting to drive innovation and make data-driven decisions without learning to code.
outcome: Become a data-driven decision maker, build industry-ready AI solutions, and gain foundational and advanced AIML skills all without coding.
